features.name: Landing Page
features.description: Main marketing landing page with hero, social proof, services, case studies, technology stack, industries, testimonials, and CTA sections. Implements SEO metadata and responsive design.

features.name: Hero Section
features.description: Hero banner with headline, subheadline, primary CTA button, and optional dashboard visual. Includes animations and responsive layout.

features.name: Social Proof
features.description: Client logo showcase section with lazy-loaded images and responsive grid layout.

features.name: Services Section
features.description: Services overview displaying 6 service cards (Custom Software, AI/ML, Web Dev, Mobile Apps, Cloud, Digital Transformation) with icons, descriptions, and links.

features.name: Technology Stack
features.description: Display of technologies across frontend, backend, cloud, AI/ML, mobile, and database categories with logos and tooltips.

features.name: Industries Section
features.description: Showcase of 6 industries served (Healthcare, FinTech, E-commerce, Education, Manufacturing, Logistics) with capabilities and gradient styling.

features.name: Case Study Spotlight
features.description: Featured case study section with KPI tiles, summary, and deep-link to full case study. Includes responsive images with CLS prevention.

features.name: Testimonials
features.description: Client testimonials carousel/list displaying 4 testimonials with author info, company, rating, and motion animation support.

features.name: CTA Sections
features.description: Call-to-action bands with prominent headlines and buttons linking to contact page. Multiple variants available.

features.name: Navigation
features.description: Sticky top navigation with mobile menu, keyboard accessibility, skip-to-content link, and ARIA labels. Links to all main pages.

features.name: Footer
features.description: Site footer with company info, social links, copyright, and key page links. Includes external link security attributes.

features.name: Why Choose Us
features.description: Section highlighting company differentiators, stats (500+ projects, 98% satisfaction, 15+ countries, 50+ technologies), and unique value propositions.

features.name: Contact Form
features.description: Multi-step contact form (4 steps) with service selection, project details, budget/timeline, and contact info. Includes form validation with Zod schema and React Hook Form.

features.name: Services Pages
features.description: Individual service pages including main services overview and custom software detail page.

features.name: Portfolio Page
features.description: Portfolio showcase page displaying client work and case studies.

features.name: About Page
features.description: Company information and team introduction page.

features.name: UI Components - Button
features.description: Reusable button component with multiple variants (primary, secondary, outline, ghost), sizes, states (loading, disabled), and icon support.

features.name: UI Components - Card
features.description: Reusable card component for content containers with consistent styling and responsive behavior.

features.name: UI Components - Section
features.description: Layout wrapper component for consistent section spacing and container management.

features.name: UI Components - Section Header
features.description: Standardized section header with eyebrow text, title, and description for consistent typography across sections.

features.name: Site Configuration
features.description: Centralized constants for site config, navigation links, services data, technologies, testimonials, stats, and industries data.

features.name: Utilities
features.description: Utility functions including className merging (cn) for Tailwind CSS class composition.
